children.label: Drag Coefficient
children.tooltip: Defines the drag coefficient of the entire vehicle as a function of wind angle of attack (tau)

children.label: Frontal Area
children.tooltip: The vehicle reference area is the projected frontal area including tires and underbody parts

children.label: Reference Length
children.tooltip: This is the length between VEHICLE.AERODYNAMIC.CONSIDERATION POINT XYZ and the vehicle's rearmost point. It is used to calculate the torques applied to VEHICLE.AERODYNAMIC.RESULTANT FORCE POINT XYZ

children.label: Wheelbase
children.tooltip: This is the vehicle wheelbase measured tire contact patch to tire contact patch

children.label: Load
children.tooltip: Preload of Front Suspension with gravity Amesim Parameter: Front SUSP Axle load

children.label: Track Width
children.tooltip: Vehicle front track width measured at the tire contact patch

children.label: Damping
children.tooltip: Shock absorber damping force characteristic in a 1D table - front suspension

children.label: Mass
children.tooltip: This is the front mass of the shock absorber

children.label: Damping
children.tooltip: Shock absorber damping characteristic in a 1D table - rear suspension

children.label: Mass
children.tooltip: This is the rear mass of the shock absorber
